Cure for homosexuals from their sickness is maybe not in line with the actual agenda but you should judge it from the historical perspective.
The author of the book was as homosexual in a concentration camp and submitted to therapy with the best intentions to restore his mental health. This is a report from the first hand and contradicts with the fake historical records that nazis have killed masses of homosexuals.
Let us be fair.
The nazis were not that bad at all as presented in the winners written history.

1_1EWcSH8L4VBXvQVn4NB4s8HsJuJzNwATYD.body:
The Nazis respected much more black people than American Jews did at that time.
That black people are less intelligent was not only a nazi ideology but a scientific fact recognized at that time everywhere around the world. But that doesnt mean that they are useless. In their natural environment in Africa and in other hot environment they are very good adapted.
Jews shouldnt send black Africans in Europe but keep them in Israel in their homeland.
